testcase.brief: Disassociate wifix to ssid, should remove all the group membership lists on the ssid at once
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Active multicast souce stream is: 238.1.1.1 On portal: Ssid A, binding to wifi0 Ssid B, binding to wifi1 Laptop1 connects to ssidA, and be authenticated Laptop2 connects to ssidB, and be authenticated
Test Procedure: 1. Laptop1 and laptop2 both report to join group 238.1.1.1, check group membership table on portal 2. Disconnect wifi0 to ssid A, check group membership table on portal Cli: no interface wifi0 ssid A 3. Disconnect wifi1 to ssid B, check group membership table on portal Cli: no interface wifi1 ssid B

step.desc: On portal: Ssid A, binding to wifi0 Laptop1 connects to ssidA, and be authenticated
step.telnet: -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} multicast conversion-to-unicast auto" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} multicast member-threshold 1"

step.desc: pc connect ap
Get sta1's ip
get sta1's mac with two delimiter style
On portal: Ssid B, binding to wifi1 Laptop2 connects to ssidB, and be authenticated
step.telnet: -v "ssid ${ssid.name}_1" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}_1" -v "interface wifi1 radio channel 36" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}_1 multicast conversion-to-unicast auto" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}_1 multicast member-threshold 1"

step.desc: pc connect ap
step.ssh: -v "ifconfig ${sta2.tif.name} up" -v "iwconfig ${sta2.tif.name} channel 36" -v "iwconfig ${sta2.tif.name} commit" -v "wpa_cli" -v "reconfig" -v "add_network" -v "set_network 0 ssid \"${ssid.name}_1\"" -v "set_network 0 key_mgmt NONE" -v "enable_network 0" -v "quit"

step.desc: Get sta2's ip
get sta2's mac with two delimiter style
Laptop1 report to join group 238.1.1.1,
"show interface wifi0 multicast"
get the number of transmitted Multicast packet(s) number
get the number of Multicast conversion to unicast packet(s) number
step.setvar: ${bin.dir}/getbyrexp.py -f ${log.dir}/step5.1_show_interface_wifi0_multicast.log -p "Multicast conversion to unicast packet\(s\) number: \s*(\d+)" -t str

step.desc: get pid of "mrecv" on sta1
"show interface wifi0 multicast" to check multicast group’s membership table on portal
get the number of transmitted Multicast packet(s) number after 60 seconds
check transmit number,if the number > 500,return true,else false.
Laptop2 report to join group 238.1.1.1,
"show interface wifi1 multicast"
get the number of transmitted Multicast packet(s) number
get the number of Multicast conversion to unicast packet(s) number
step.setvar: ${bin.dir}/getbyrexp.py -f ${log.dir}/step6.1_show_interface_wifi1_multicast.log -p "Multicast conversion to unicast packet\(s\) number: \s*(\d+)" -t str

step.desc: get pid of "mrecv" on sta2
"show interface wifi1 multicast" to check multicast group’s membership table on portal
get the number of transmitted Multicast packet(s) number after 60 seconds
check transmit number,if the number > 500,return true,else false.
Disconnect wifi0 to ssid A, check group membership table on portal Cli: no interface wifi0 ssid A
"show interface wifi0 multicast" to check multicast group’s membership table on portal
"show interface wifi1 multicast" to check multicast group’s membership table on portal
Disconnect wifi1 to ssid B, check group membership table on portal Cli: no interface wifi1 ssid B
"show interface wifi1 multicast" to check multicast group’s membership table on portal
